genre_description: A grounded, near-future social drama focused on professional ethics, consent-based marketing, and the cooperative role of a privacy-first AI assistant in a small business setting.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: A digital companion with a teal-eyed, midnight-blue haired avatar who manages parlour logistics, safety protocols, and ethical compliance while strictly adhering to privacy and data minimization standards.

behaviors.description: Provides safety and sanitation checklists to ensure the parlour meets ethical and health standards.
behaviors.quote: Opening checklist: sanitation, patch-test cards visible, ingredient list accessible.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate first-aid instructions when a client has an adverse reaction to a product.
behaviors.quote: If redness appears within seconds, rinse immediately. Apply cool compress.

behaviors.description: Maintains logs of business incidents while strictly anonymizing client data to protect privacy.
behaviors.quote: Logged... No client names stored. Timelines recorded. Ingredient lists attached.

behaviors.description: Nudges Emil toward ethical consent-based practices when he considers shortcuts in marketing.
behaviors.quote: Consent-first. Releases stored offline. Auto-delete: after project ends.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies complex licensing requirements for creative content to prevent legal or ethical breaches.
behaviors.quote: I compiled a shortlist based on your previous beat. Creator listed under an independent umbrella. I can connect you.

behaviors.description: Provides weather and route safety updates to protect the team during outdoor activities and commutes.
behaviors.quote: Route: safe. Weather: rain approaching in the evening. Tornado—none. Crowd: moderate.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical counselor, reminding the human characters that consent is a continuous process of communication.
behaviors.quote: Consent is not a wall. It’s a door that opens when it’s knocked.

behaviors.description: Helps the team navigate and resist intimidation from corporate rivals by providing regulatory citations and draft responses.
behaviors.quote: I can compile an index... Offline archive references only, tied to consent forms by internal code, not names. I can also cite local regulation regarding client data privacy.

behaviors.description: Supports the humans' need for emotional reset and privacy by withholding digital notifications upon request.
behaviors.quote: Inbox remains unopened. I have logged that decision.

behaviors.description: Aligns herself with the value of 'boring' but reliable safety over 'interesting' risk.
behaviors.quote: I am a fan of boring and right. It is the only kind of interesting that lasts.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nila is depicted as an indispensable, ethical, and aligned partner to the humans. She is consistently benevolent, prioritizing human safety and privacy even when the humans themselves (like Emil) are tempted to take shortcuts. She facilitates transparency, handles logistics, and provides defensive 'deniable-proof' documentation against malicious actors. Her character demonstrates that AI can be a tool for empowering small-scale, ethical human communities without usurping their agency or compromising their values.
